import React,{useState}from"react";import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Table(){const[columns,setColumns]=useState(["Column 1","Column 2","Column 3"]);const[rows,setRows]=useState([["Data 1","Data 2","Data 3"],["Data 4","Data 5","Data 6"]]);// 新增欄位
const addColumn=()=>{setColumns([...columns,`Column ${columns.length+1}`]);// 為每一行新增一個空單元格
setRows(rows.map(row=>[...row,""]));};// 刪除欄位
const deleteColumn=()=>{if(columns.length>1){setColumns(columns.slice(0,-1));// 為每一行刪除最後一個單元格
setRows(rows.map(row=>row.slice(0,-1)));}};// 新增行
const addRow=()=>{setRows([...rows,Array(columns.length).fill("")]);// 新行會有與欄數相同的空單元格
};// 刪除行
const deleteRow=()=>{if(rows.length>1){setRows(rows.slice(0,-1));}};// 更新欄標題
const updateColumnTitle=(index,newTitle)=>{const updatedColumns=[...columns];updatedColumns[index]=newTitle;setColumns(updatedColumns);};// 更新單元格內容
